description.title: Event relevancy - four subscriptions through single WE, event is relevant to account registered last
description.purpose:
The game user account deploys the Relevancy contract, calls the method on the contract to emit the CallerIndexedAddress with addr = the user account address. The following accounts are used to register (in this order) + the subscription and event emission;
Account 1 - shared wallet extension Account 2 - shared wallet extension Account 3 - shared wallet extension Game User - shared wallet extension
Subscribe for the CallerIndexedAddress event which contains a single indexed address field (all) Event is emitted containing address of user account
Under this sequence currently the event is not decrypted and sent back to the subscription id, as it by default binds to the first registered key.
